meanings.definition: Become subject to (something unwelcome or unpleasant) as a result of one's own behavior or actions.
meanings.sent1: When you don't follow the rules, you may incurs consequences.
meanings.sent2: She incurs a fine for parking in the wrong spot.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat incurs the wrath of the dog by stealing its toy.
meanings.sent4: Ignoring warnings often incurs a heavy price in the end.
meanings.sent5: His reckless behavior incurs trouble wherever he goes.
